resources.string: This is the player screen, you can go to the library of songs, artists and genre. To play music I could have MediaPlayer class and AudioManager class
This is a library of songs, you can choose a song to play or send a name to a friend.
This is the genre library screen, you can select an genre and you will be redirected to the genres play list or send the genre to a friend.
This is the artist library screen, you can select an artist and you will be redirected to the artist\'s play list or send the artists name to a friend.
To play music I could have MediaPlayer class and AudioManager class
